metadata.title: CVE-2018-5766 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Libav through 12.2, there is an invalid memcpy in the av_packet_reffunction of libavcodec/avpacket.c. Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) via acrafted avi file.

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
